comment: She is awful! She doesn't talk about anything relevant to what was supposed to be read before class and she is extremely rude. I went to her office for her hours and waited 30 min she never showed up don't even bother to take her unless she is the ONLY option and you NEED the class

I took this class online. I learned nothing. The exams are pointless, the discussion board (30% of your grade), there is no guideline or rubric on how she grades you, but apparently she grades quite harshly.

PROFESSOR HALEY SHOULD NOT BE TEACHING! She is the least organized professor I've ever had. Doesn't know whats going on in her own class. Class attendance is mandatory but it's a total waste of time. I could have bought the book myself and taught myself. AVOID AVOID AVOID.
Ms. Haley is a good teacher if you pay attention and go to class.

Horrible professor! Never follows syllabus. She just rambles on in class and it doesn't have anything to do with the test. She is always correct. You can't have your own opinion. I do NOT recommend taking her at all. Take any other professor.

She is a horrible teacher. Does not follow syllabus, never clear on what to do. She talks about things that have nothing to do with class. She is late to class and gives generic grades at a much later date. She laughs at student comments and makes fun of lifestyles. She has useless lectures and should not be a teacher. If you can, don't taker her!

She is  unorganized and makes a lot of mistakes, which is understandable, but she does not realize it or try to remedy it. Delete's things on accident and forgets to post things. Says discussions are worth 10 pts each totaling 100, but we do way more than 10 discussions-Very inconsistant.

WORST TEACHER I HAVE EVER HAD! she insulted me and kept calling me names during a presentation under her breath, but enough for me to hear then i was asking questions and she insulted me again and yelled at me to sit down. she cancelled class constantly. when we did have class we got in groups and summarized the book to each other

Professor Haley's coursework could be a bit troubling at times, however when I requested help I received it. I slacked major in her class and still came out with a B. Show interest in her class and allow her to associate a face with your name and you will be ok.

Nice teacher. Seems to know alot about the subject matter. Allows open discussion in class. However, the thing I disliked most about her teaching is that she often tends to contradict her beliefs. For example, she'll make a statement, and as soon as someone challenges it or ask a question, she'll take on the other side.

She definitely knows the subject matter, however, she is very unorganized. Assigns a lot of papers, but is unclear in how she grades them. The class could have been a lot worse,  but it is a lot of stress for a gen ed course.

She seems clueless about how to teach. She has so many papers that you have to write but does not give clear expectations-then grades papers low. Midterm was easy with help of the book. Also,she NEVER responds to emails, even we she asks you to email her.

DID NOT LIKE AT ALL. She wouldn't respond to emails and doesn't like when you ask questions. She will disagree with everything you say and contradict herself. I won't doubt she knows the subject though but she made me dislike the subject.

WORST TEACHER I HAVE EVER HAD. I have no doubt she knows the subject well but she has no idea how to teach. Doesn't give guidelines or clear expectation. Never gives a lecture to explain reading. Group and class discussions about the previous nights work in ever session but when you ask for clarification she just says if you read you should know.
